# samsungcloudplatform_certificates (Data Source)

Provides Certificate List

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "samsungcloudplatform_certificates" "my_certificates" {
}

output "contents" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatform_certificates.my_certificates.contents
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `page` (Number) Page start number from which to get the list
- `size` (Number) Size to get list
- `sort` (String) Sort

### Read-Only

- `certificate_name` (String) Certificate Name
- `common_name` (String) Common Name
- `contents` (Block List) Certificate list (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--contents))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `total_count` (Number) Total list size

<a id="nestedblock--contents"></a>
### Nested Schema for `contents`

Read-Only:

- `certificate_expiration_date` (String) Certificate Expiration Date
- `certificate_id` (String) Certificate Id
- `certificate_name` (String) Certificate Name
- `certificate_start_date` (String) Certificate start Date
- `certificate_state` (String) Certificate State
- `common_name` (String) Common Name
- `created_by` (String) Created By
- `created_dt` (String) Creation date
- `modified_by` (String) Modified By
- `modified_dt` (String) Modified date
- `purpose_type` (String) Purpose Type
